jcr:content.jcr:title: Prime Minister of the Sahrawi Arab Democratic Republic

contentheadline.headline: Prime Minister of the Sahrawi Arab Democratic Republic

contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Political post |post = Prime Minister |body = the<br/>Sahrawi Arab Democratic Republic |insignia = Coat of arms of the Sahrawi Arab Democratic Republic.svg |insigniasize = 125px |insigniacaption = [[Coat of arms of the Sahrawi Arab Democratic Republic]] |nativename = |image = |imagesize = 165px |incumbent = [[Abdelkader Taleb Omar]] |incumbentsince = 29 October 2003 |style = |residence = [[Sahrawi refugee camps]], [[Tindouf]], [[Algeria]] |appointer = [[Mohamed Abdelaziz]],<br /><small>as [[President of the Sahrawi Arab Democratic Republic]] |termlength = |formation = 5 March 1976 |succession = |inaugural = [[Mohamed Lamine Ould Ahmed]] |deputy = |salary = |website = }} {{Politics of the Sahrawi Arab Democratic Republic}} The '''Prime Minister of the [[Sahrawi Arab Democratic Republic]]''' is the [[head of government]] of the SADR, while the [[President of Western Sahara|President]] is the [[head of state]]. The [[Sahrawi Arab Democratic Republic]] was proclaimed in the territory that made up the [[Spain|Spanish]] colony of [[Spanish Sahara]] on February 27, 1976. Since that time, a [[government in exile]] has operated in the [[Sahrawi people|Sahrawi]] [[refugee]] camps in [[Tindouf]], [[Algeria]]. ==Prime Ministers of the Sahrawi Arab Democratic Republic (1976–Present)== (Dates in italics indicate ''de facto ''continuation of office) {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:85%;" |- align=left ! width="18%"|Tenure ! width=60|Portrait ! width="55%"|Incumbent ! width="10%"|[[#Affiliations|Affiliation]] ! width="15%"|Notes |- valign=top |colspan="5"|'''[[Sahrawi Arab Democratic Republic]]''' |- valign=top |colspan="5"|الجمهورية العربية الصحراوية الديمقراطية (''Al-Jumhūrīyya al-`Arabīyya aṣ-Ṣaḥrāwīyya ad-Dīmuqrāṭīyya'') |- valign=top bgcolor="#ffffec" |<small>5 March 1976 to 4 November 1982|| [[File:Mohamed Lamin Ahmed.jpg|60px]] ||'''[[Mohamed Lamine Ould Ahmed]]''', <small>Prime Minister||<small>Polisario Front||<small>1st Term |- valign=top bgcolor="#ffffec" |<small>4 November 1982 to 18 December 1985||<!-- Deleted image removed: [[File:MAHFUD ALI BEIBA3.jpg|60px]] -->||'''[[Mahfoud Ali Beiba]]''', <small>Prime Minister||<small>Polisario Front||<small>1st Term |- valign=top bgcolor="#ffffec" |<small>18 December 1985 to 16 August 1988|| [[File:Mohamed Lamin Ahmed.jpg|60px]] ||'''[[Mohamed Lamine Ould Ahmed]]''', <small>Prime Minister||<small>Polisario Front||<small>2nd Term |- valign=top bgcolor="#ffffec" |<small>16 August 1988 to 18 September 1993||<!-- Deleted image removed: [[File:MAHFUD ALI BEIBA3.jpg|60px]] -->||'''[[Mahfoud Ali Beiba]]''', <small>Prime Minister||<small>Polisario Front||<small>2nd Term |- valign=top bgcolor="#ffffec" |<small>19 September 1993 to 8 September 1995|| [[File:Buchraya Hamudi Bayun.png|60px]] ||'''[[Bouchraya Hammoudi Bayoun]]''', <small>Prime Minister||<small>Polisario Front||<small>1st Term |- valign=top bgcolor="#ffffec" |<small>8 September 1995 to 10 February 1999||<!-- Deleted image removed: [[File:MAHFUD ALI BEIBA3.jpg|60px]] -->||'''[[Mahfoud Ali Beiba]]''', <small>Prime Minister||<small>Polisario Front||<small>3rd Term |- valign=top bgcolor="#ffffec" |<small>10 February 1999 to 29 October 2003|| [[File:Buchraya Hamudi Bayun.png|60px]] ||'''[[Bouchraya Hammoudi Bayoun]]''', <small>Prime Minister||<small>Polisario Front||<small>2nd Term |- valign=top bgcolor="#ffffec" |<small>29 October 2003 to Present|| [[File: Abdelkader Taleb Omar.jpg|60px]] ||'''[[Abdelkader Taleb Omar]]''', <small>Prime Minister||<small>Polisario Front||<small> |- |} ==Affiliations== *Polisario Front - [[Polisario Front|Popular Front for the Liberation of Saguia el-Hamra and Río de Oro]] ==See also== *[[History of Western Sahara]] *[[List of colonial heads of Spanish Sahara]] *[[President of the Sahrawi Arab Democratic Republic]]
